# Container Apps Managed Environment Managed Certificate

<!-- BEGIN\_TF\_DOCS -->
<!-- END\_TF\_DOCS -->

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD033 -->
## Requirements

The following requirements are needed by this module:

- <a name="requirement_terraform"></a> [terraform](#requirement\_terraform) (>= 1.10, < 2.0)

- <a name="requirement_azapi"></a> [azapi](#requirement\_azapi) (~> 2.6)

## Resources

The following resources are used by this module:

- [azapi_resource.this](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/Azure/azapi/latest/docs/resources/resource) (resource)

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD013 -->
## Required Inputs

The following input variables are required:

### <a name="input_location"></a> [location](#input\_location)

Description: The Azure region where the managed certificate resource should be created.

Type: `string`

### <a name="input_managed_environment"></a> [managed\_environment](#input\_managed\_environment)

Description: The managed environment resource.

Type:

```hcl
object({
    resource_id = string
  })
```

### <a name="input_name"></a> [name](#input\_name)

Description: The name of the managed certificate resource.

Type: `string`

### <a name="input_subject_name"></a> [subject\_name](#input\_subject\_name)

Description: The subject name (domain name) for the certificate.

Type: `string`

## Optional Inputs

The following input variables are optional (have default values):

### <a name="input_domain_control_validation"></a> [domain\_control\_validation](#input\_domain\_control\_validation)

Description: The domain control validation method. Possible values: 'CNAME', 'HTTP', 'TXT'. Defaults to 'HTTP'.

Type: `string`

Default: `"HTTP"`

### <a name="input_tags"></a> [tags](#input\_tags)

Description: (Optional) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

Type: `map(string)`

Default: `null`

### <a name="input_timeouts"></a> [timeouts](#input\_timeouts)

Description:  - `create` - (Defaults to 30 minutes) Used when creating the managed certificate.
 - `delete` - (Defaults to 30 minutes) Used when deleting the managed certificate.
 - `read` - (Defaults to 5 minutes) Used when retrieving the managed certificate.
 - `update` - (Defaults to 30 minutes) Used when updating the managed certificate.

Type:

```hcl
object({
    create = optional(string)
    delete = optional(string)
    read   = optional(string)
    update = optional(string)
  })
```

Default: `null`

## Outputs

The following outputs are exported:

### <a name="output_name"></a> [name](#output\_name)

Description: The name of the managed certificate.

### <a name="output_resource_id"></a> [resource\_id](#output\_resource\_id)

Description: The resource ID of the managed certificate.

## Modules

No modules.
